column3: Latest;Phnom Penh –------   On the afternoon of January 21
column5: a car with Chinese nationals was driven from ​​Kandal province’s Ang Snuol and stopped by police in Por Sen Chey district roundabout. A body of a Chinese national was lying in the back.------The case is thought as being a kidnapping attempt
column6: with initial reports saying the victim was snatched from his place of business
column7: and police were alerted to the LX470  as it headed towards Phnom Penh.------Both suspects were referred to the Criminal Police Department for further investigation.------Warning! Images of scene in------ LINK
